p: Some studies combined more than one plasticizer in order to overcome the brittleness of the alginate films and coatings. Fan, et al. [ 94] chose glycerol, palmitic acid, Î²-cyclodextrin, and glycerol monostearate in film formulation. Su Cha, et al. [ 95] used a 1:1 concentration of polyethylene glycol and glycerol combination.
